Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Vlakvarkfontein_Coal_Mine. Coordinates for the Vlakvarkfontein Coal Mine located in Delmas, Mpumalanga, South Africa. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Vlakvarkfontein_Coal_Mine. The Vlakvarkfontein Coal Mine is also known as Ntshovelo Colliery and is a surface mine providing thermal coal

web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Ntshovelo Mining Resources and owned by Ichor Coal, which is part of a larger ownership structure involving Mbuyelo Coal.
